thread.title: Van Jones: Trump Needs to Be as Forceful on Other Acts of Hate as He Is on Islamic Terrorism
thread.title_full: Van Jones: Trump Needs to Be as Forceful on Other Acts of Hate as He Is on Islamic Terrorism

author: Josh Feldman
title: Van Jones: Trump Needs to Be as Forceful on Other Acts of Hate as He Is on Islamic Terrorism
text:
Yikes, Ivanka Trump Jewelry Company Owes Thousands in Back Taxes video Van Jones: Trump Needs to Be as Forceful on Other Acts of Hate as He Is on Islamic Terrorism by Josh Feldman | 10:48 pm, February 21st, 2017 
CNN’s Van Jones said tonight that President Trump needs to be doing more to address racism and anti-Semitism in the United States. 
He told Anderson Cooper that he hopes Trump does more to address the “common pain between blacks and whites that could led to common purpose,” but he hasn’t seen that much action on it yet. 
Paris Dennard defended the president and said that common pain is why he won, and he’s encouraged by Trump wanting to be the president for all Americans. 
Jones said Trump has an opportunity to be a “special champion” against racism and anti-Semitism––topics that Trump spoke on today ––but also observed that Trump has a “hair trigger when it comes to Islamic forms of terrorism as opposed to other forms of terrorism.” 
Watch above, via CNN.
